statements: UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET disease_name='Cancer', medication_name='Chemotherapy', effectiveness_score=8.5 WHERE trial_id=1;
UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET effectiveness_score=7.2, medication_name='Antibiotics', disease_name='Infection' WHERE trial_id=2;
UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET effectiveness_score = 8.5, medication_name = 'MedX' WHERE trial_id = 100
UPDATE clinical_trial_data SET disease_name = 'Diabetes', effectiveness_score = 9.2 WHERE trial_id = 200
UPDATE clinical_trials SET effectiveness_rating = 8 WHERE trial_id = 1;
UPDATE trial_results SET outcome = 'Successful' WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE clinical_trials SET effectiveness_rating = 5 WHERE trial_id = 1;
UPDATE trial_results SET outcome = 'Successful', duration_in_days = 30 WHERE patient_id = 100;
UPDATE clinical_trials SET medication_name = 'New Medication', patient_id = 101 WHERE trial_id = 1;
UPDATE medications SET dosage = 50, manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer' WHERE medication_id = 3;
UPDATE clinical_trials SET medication_name = 'Prozac', patient_id = 101 WHERE trial_id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE clinical_trials SET trial_start_date='2022-08-15 09:00:00' WHERE trial_id=1;
UPDATE patients SET age=35, gender='Female' WHERE patient_id=3;
UPDATE clinical_trials SET trial_start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE trial_id = 1
UPDATE patients SET gender = 'Female', age = 40 WHERE patient_id = 3
UPDATE patients SET age = 30 WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE measurements SET value = 8.5 WHERE patient_id = 101 AND measurement_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE patients SET age = age + 1, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE medications SET manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer', dosage = 2.5 WHERE medication_id = 3;
